tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: DR Anjali was introduced to us for our babyâ€™s (1 month old) vaccination and we observed a well organised health care in terms of appointments, meeting with doctor, making baby comfortable at clinic to treat the baby and also makes us more comfortable in terms of clarifying our never ending clarifications. Doctor is friendly in nature and gives satisfying explanations related to our baby care and health. We are happy and feel safe to be able to get our health care f Iâ€™m the clinic. Highly recommend the clinic Kids Ecare clinic, Kattupakkam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We Love how amazing this young doctor and her staff is..! They always follow up with us and call to remind us about our appointments. For me its all about convenience and they are always flexible to fit time around my schedule! If we needed to see her same day they make time..
She always been calm and reassuring which is what I need. He listens and makes decisions with you. It feels so nice to know that I can trust her word. She was great with my three year old too!  my baby boy love her..!! 

Ethical practise.. Avoiding unnecessary supplements or antibiotics..which I found very different from others..

Doc..You have shown your kindness and incredible knowledge through your ongoing treatment. You never take a parent's concern lightly, and treat our son with great respect for his privacy and needs as well. You have a Godly touch, and we appreciate you and your staff very much..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She doesn't recommend unwanted medicine. She suggests natural way to treat the issue first. She is a good doctor whom I can trust my child with. Very friendly and listens to our questions. Also, we get remainder call for vaccination which is very helpful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
